channel.title: rice cooker on Food for Thought
channel.description: Recent content in rice cooker on Food for Thought

item.title: Rice Bowl with Chinese sausage
item.description: Ingredients 3 cups (rice cooker cups) white rice 2 cups broccoli ~2 cups chicken stock (amount depends on rice cooker) 1/2 package Chinese sausage (maybe 1/2 lb ish?) 2 cups frozen mixed veggies (peas/corn/carrots/etc) 1/3 cup crushed pineapple 2.5 Tbsp soy sauce 1 tsp sesame oil 3 tbs sriracha other spices as desired Directions Rinse and cut broccoli. Begin cooking rice the usual way (rinse it, you fool!), except use chicken stock instead of water.
